creditline: Gift of Vanessa Laird and Timothy Raylor
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: four dancing figures wearing identical costumes:  black and white headdresses with pairs of feathers; yellow and brown fur pelts around their necks and mouths, each with a pair of downward-hanging animal feet; green short skirts with black geometric patterns at hem; belts with jingle bells; black and white moccasins; grey stockings with green and red ties at the knees; figures each hold a rattle in one hand and a pine branch in the other hands; grey ground with stepped patterns in different shades of grey at top and bottom
title: Rabbit Dancers
